document.full_text: the international monetary fund on thursday urged china to allow the yuan rise further to rebalance its vast economy, and called for freer use of the currency in global trade and commerce.
document.title: firm yuan to help rebalance china economy: imf's lipsky
lines_and_colors: the international monetary fund on thursday urged china to allow the yuan rise further to rebalance its vast economy, and called for freer use of the currency in global trade and commerce.
